articles.title: Code
articles.description: A place to store code and data from the book
articles.contents:
Data
All the data for the book can be found in the GitHub repository.
Diamonds
An example of code and plots displayed within the website. You can download the diamonds dataset here.


library("ggplot2")

ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point()

articles.title: Covid by Numbers
articles.description: This site hosts for the code for the Covid by Numbers book by Sir David Spiegelhalter and Anthony Masters.
